name: Stream
title: Google
Cloud
Speech
Stream
description:
Stream

A resource that represents the streaming requests and responses.

examples.code:
require "google/cloud/speech"

speech = Google::Cloud::Speech.new

stream = speech.stream encoding: :linear16,
                       language: "en-US",
                       sample_rate: 16000

# Stream 5 seconds of audio from the microphone
# Actual implementation of microphone input varies by platform
5.times do
  stream.send MicrophoneInput.read(32000)
end

stream.stop
stream.wait_until_complete!

results = stream.results
result = results.first
result.transcript #=> "how old is the Brooklyn Bridge"
result.confidence #=> 0.9826789498329163

methods.name: results
title: Google
Cloud
Speech
Stream#results
methods.description: The speech recognition results for the audio.

examples.code:
require "google/cloud/speech"

speech = Google::Cloud::Speech.new

stream = speech.stream encoding: :linear16,
                       language: "en-US",
                       sample_rate: 16000

# Stream 5 seconds of audio from the microphone
# Actual implementation of microphone input varies by platform
5.times do
  stream.send MicrophoneInput.read(32000)
end

stream.stop

results = stream.results
results.each do |result|
  puts result.transcript
  puts result.confidence
end

methods.name: on_interim
title: Google
Cloud
Speech
Stream#on_interim
methods.description: Register to be notified on the reception of an interim result.

examples.code:
require "google/cloud/speech"

speech = Google::Cloud::Speech.new

stream = speech.stream encoding: :linear16,
                       language: "en-US",
                       sample_rate: 16000

# register callback for when an interim result is returned
stream.on_interim do |final_results, interim_results|
  interim_result = interim_results.first
  puts interim_result.transcript # "how old is the Brooklyn Bridge"
  puts interim_result.confidence # 0.9826789498329163
  puts interim_result.stability # 0.8999
end

# Stream 5 seconds of audio from the microphone
# Actual implementation of microphone input varies by platform
5.times do
  stream.send MicrophoneInput.read(32000)
end

stream.stop

params.name: yield
params.description: The block for accessing final and interim results.

methods.name: on_complete
title: Google
Cloud
Speech
Stream#on_complete
methods.description: Register to be notified when the end of the audio stream has been reached.

examples.code:
require "google/cloud/speech"

speech = Google::Cloud::Speech.new

stream = speech.stream encoding: :linear16,
                       language: "en-US",
                       sample_rate: 16000

# register callback for when stream has ended.
stream.on_complete do
  puts "Stream has ended."
end

# Stream 5 seconds of audio from the microphone
# Actual implementation of microphone input varies by platform
5.times do
  stream.send MicrophoneInput.read(32000)
end

stream.stop

The block to be called when the end of the audio

methods.name: on_utterance
title: Google
Cloud
Speech
Stream#on_utterance
methods.description: Register to be notified when the server has detected the end of the userâ€™s speech utterance and expects no additional speech. Therefore, the server will not process additional audio. The client should stop sending additional audio data. This event only occurs when utterance is true.

examples.code:
require "google/cloud/speech"

speech = Google::Cloud::Speech.new

stream = speech.stream encoding: :linear16,
                       language: "en-US",
                       sample_rate: 16000,
                       utterance: true

# register callback for when utterance has occurred.
stream.on_utterance do
  puts "Utterance has occurred."
  stream.stop
end

# Stream 5 seconds of audio from the microphone
# Actual implementation of microphone input varies by platform
5.times do
  stream.send MicrophoneInput.read(32000)
end

stream.stop unless stream.stopped?

methods.name: on_error
title: Google
Cloud
Speech
Stream#on_error
methods.description: Register to be notified of an error received during the stream.

examples.code:
require "google/cloud/speech"

speech = Google::Cloud::Speech.new

stream = speech.stream encoding: :linear16,
                       language: "en-US",
                       sample_rate: 16000

# register callback for when an error is returned
stream.on_error do |error|
  puts "The following error occurred while streaming: #{error}"
  stream.stop
end

# Stream 5 seconds of audio from the microphone
# Actual implementation of microphone input varies by platform
5.times do
  stream.send MicrophoneInput.read(32000)
end

stream.stop
